item.description:
February is the beginning of Spring. After the long winter, all the plants re-strength the energy from the root, now is spreading to the branches.
when the weather is getting warmer. all the plants will have the blossoms and new leaves.

This is the time that we are ready for this whole new year! We can refresh from last year and looking forward to the year of 2008.

Please join us at this month meeting!

LOOKING FORWARD TO SEE EVERYONE

: )
item.how_to_find_us: the location is in the Carlton Garden condos which is the 2nd building on your right when you drive in! You can park any place with a visitor/ guest parking sign!
item.why: It is fun and you can meet a lot of people with open minded about everything!
item.name: february spirituality meetups
